#summary Download WebWind

= Download =

You can download WebWind binary and source code from: [http://code.google.com/p/webwind/downloads/list]

And put the `WebWind.jar` into `/WEB-INF/lib/`.

To get the latest source code, please check out the source code from SVN: 
[http://webwind.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/WebWind].

= Dependencies =

WebWind depends on [http://commons.apache.org/logging/ Commons Logging] only.

Based on your IoC container, you may need [http://code.google.com/p/google-guice/ Guice] 
or [http://www.springsource.org/ Spring]. See more information of [DeveloperIoC choose an IoC container]
